comments: It is easy to type binomial(2n,n)/(2n+1) by mistake, when one really wants the Catalan numbers binomial(2n,n)/(n+1), A000108.Differs from A000984 at positions in A101681.
formula: Numerators in the G.f.: 1/(2*sqrt(x))*arcsin(2*sqrt(x)). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, May 31 2013]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 28 2000
